mapper.sql: id, code, name, be_disable, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, apply_code, be_effective, selection_effective_time, selection_effective_start_time, company_code, company_name, ext_field_1, ext_field_2, ext_field_3, ext_field_4, ext_field_5, ext_field_6
mapper.select:
select a.id aid, a.code acode, a.name aname, a.be_disable abe_disable, a.create_by acreate_by, a.create_time acreate_time, a.update_by aupdate_by, a.update_time aupdate_time, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.be_effective abe_effective, a.selection_effective_time aselection_effective_time, a.selection_effective_start_time aselection_effective_start_time, a.company_code acompany_code, a.company_name acompany_name, a.ext_field_1 aext_field_1, a.ext_field_2 aext_field_2, a.ext_field_3 aext_field_3, a.ext_field_4 aext_field_4, a.ext_field_5 aext_field_5, a.ext_field_6 aext_field_6, b.id bid, b.code bcode, b.sku_code bsku_code, b.sku_name bsku_name, b.be_disable bbe_disable, b.categories_supply_channels_code bcategories_supply_channels_code, b.categories_supply_channels_name bcategories_supply_channels_name, b.direct_delivery_supplier_code bdirect_delivery_supplier_code, b.direct_delivery_supplier_name bdirect_delivery_supplier_name, b.create_by bcreate_by, b.create_time bcreate_time, b.update_by bupdate_by, b.update_time bupdate_time, b.company_code bcompany_code, b.company_name bcompany_name, b.ext_field_1 bext_field_1, b.ext_field_2 bext_field_2, b.ext_field_3 bext_field_3, b.ext_field_4 bext_field_4, b.ext_field_5 bext_field_5, b.ext_field_6 bext_field_6, c.id cid, c.main_code cmain_code, c.sku_code csku_code, c.type ctype, c.status cstatus, c.name cname, c.code ccode, c.company_code ccompany_code, c.company_name ccompany_name, c.province_id cprovince_id, c.ext_field_1 cext_field_1, c.ext_field_2 cext_field_2, c.ext_field_3 cext_field_3, c.ext_field_4 cext_field_4, c.ext_field_5 cext_field_5, c.ext_field_6 cext_field_6, d.id did, d.code dcode, d.price_channel_code dprice_channel_code, d.price_channel_name dprice_channel_name, d.company_code dcompany_code, d.company_name dcompany_name, d.ext_field_1 dext_field_1, d.ext_field_2 dext_field_2, d.ext_field_3 dext_field_3, d.ext_field_4 dext_field_4, d.ext_field_5 dext_field_5, d.ext_field_6 dext_field_6 from product_sku_sale_area_main a left join product_sku_sale_area b on a.code = b.code left join product_sku_sale_area_info c on a.code = c.main_code left join product_sku_sale_area_channel d on a.code = d.code where a.code in
#{item}

select a.id from product_sku_sale_area_main a left join product_sku_sale_area b on a.code = b.code left join product_sku_sale_area_info c on a.code = c.main_code where a.company_code = #{companyCode} and a.be_effective = 1
and a.code like concat('%',#{code},'%')
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.be_disable = #{beDisable}
and b.sku_code like concat('%',#{skuCode},'%')
and b.sku_name like concat('%',#{skuName},'%')
and c.name like concat('%',#{allowArea},'%') and c.status = 1 and c.type = 1
and c.name like concat('%',#{forbiddenArea},'%') and c.status = 0 and c.type = 1
and c.name like concat('%',#{allowStore},'%') and c.status = 1 and c.type = 2
and c.name like concat('%',#{forbiddenStore},'%') and c.status = 0 and c.type = 2
group by a.id order by a.create_time desc

select a.code acode, a.name aname, a.be_disable abe_disable, a.create_by acreate_by, a.create_time acreate_time, a.update_by aupdate_by, a.update_time aupdate_time, b.sku_code bsku_code, b.sku_name bsku_name, e.color_name bcolorName, f.spec bspec, e.model_number bmodelNumber, b.be_disable bbe_disable, b.categories_supply_channels_code bcategories_supply_channels_code, b.categories_supply_channels_name bcategories_supply_channels_name, b.direct_delivery_supplier_code bdirect_delivery_supplier_code, b.direct_delivery_supplier_name bdirect_delivery_supplier_name, c.type ctype, c.status cstatus, c.name cname, c.code ccode, d.price_channel_code dprice_channel_code, d.price_channel_name dprice_channel_name from product_sku_sale_area_main a left join product_sku_sale_area b on a.code = b.code left join product_sku_sale_area_info c on a.code = c.main_code left join product_sku_sale_area_channel d on a.code = d.code left join product_sku e on b.sku_code = e.sku_code left join product_sku_distribution_info f on f.product_sku_code = b.sku_code where a.code = #{code}

select
from product_sku_sale_area_main where be_effective = 0 and selection_effective_start_time <= now()

(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.beDisable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.beEffective,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.selectionEffectiveTime,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.selectionEffectiveStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.extField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.extField2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.extField3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.extField4,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.extField5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.extField6,jdbcType=BIGINT})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
